plot outline: After realising that his son and daughter-in-law find him to be a burden, Venkatesh Murthy, a retired employee and a widower, finds a job in a real estate business. His keen eye for detail, helps uncover the shady businesses of his new boss.
title: Kempirve
plot: A story of a middle class man 'Venkatesh Murthy'.

After realising that his son and daughter-in-law find him to be a burden, Venkatesh Murthy, a retired employee and a widower, finds a job in a real estate business. His keen eye for detail, helps uncover the shady businesses of his new boss.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
